posts.name: Pete Walters
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.38 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group .

Release notes:

  • Now you can easily see all of your unread chats by pulling down in the chat list. Quickly filter what’s unread, but feel free to take your time while deciding whether or not to leave them on read.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.37 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.38.0.451-beta

37 new commits since 7.37.0.447-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.38 [1]

  • Add rotateManifest to Storage Service and use in SVR code [2]

  • Upgrade GitHub Actions to macOS 15 [3]

  • Add recordIkm encryption scheme migration to Storage Service [4]

  • Fully Swiftify StorageServiceManager [5]

  • Prune a couple ImplRef properties off SSKEnvironment [6]

  • Add ad hoc calls to backups [7]

  • [RFC] Run IncrementalTSAttachmentMigrator when the main app is foregrounded [8]

  • Don't restore empty payment transaction data [9]

  • Update to libsignal v0.61.0 [10]

  • Configure whether libsignal should use connection fallbacks [11]

  • Convert CallLink expiration seconds<->ms for backups [12]

  • Fix adHoc-less CallLinks not showing on CallsTab when backup-restored [13]

  • In backups, wrap CallLinkRecord rowId in struct instead of typealias [14]

  • Drop group story replies for missing stories [15]

  • Fix status bar style on launch screen […] [16]

  • Show number of people in the call before joining [17]

  • Use null to represent quoted reply target message not found [18]

  • Update app icons [19]

  • Log instead of owsFailDebug when unable to parse NationalNumber for indexing [20]

  • Remove unused method [21]

  • Clean up MessageBackupAuthCredentialManager [22]

  • Add Pull to Clear [23]

  • Restore group and contact avatars after backup restore [24]

  • migrate to async swift for ProvisioningController continue button [25]

  • Use failable insert methods everywhere possible in backups [26]

  • Tweak filter clear button foreground colour [27]

  • move mode switch button to UIAction [28]

  • Don't download quote thumbnails when we have the target message locally [29]

  • Remove unimplemented backup error case [30]

  • Add retrying to MessageBackupAvatarFetcher [31]

  • Handle negative angle for chat color gradient [32]

  • Add MessageBackup.LogLevel to suppress warnings [33]

  • Rename variables that don’t store group IDs [34]

  • Update backup proto with newly-optional fields (and some comment updates) [35]

  • Update navigation bar style based on SwiftUI content offset [36]

  • Update translations [37]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.37.0.447-beta…7.38.0.451-beta

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

At least 4 languages changed since 7.37.0.447-beta:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from “Updated language translations” and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.37.0.447-beta so far here.

  • French (fr): main
  • German (de): main • plural
  • Spanish (es): main • plural
  • Ukrainian (uk): main

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

Why is the new Split Screen logo black-white in Dark Mode?

image640×1136 238 KB

And

When using the new filter function, it gives me a chat that is read

image640×1136 48.7 KB

DebugLogs
I ran into the problem before updating from 7.37 stable to the new beta, so maybe this problem is already solved.

Lkunited:

When using the new filter function, it gives me a chat that is read

A log might be helpful

Signal crashed after I tried to accept an incoming video call
https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.38.0/7f27c773cc140df8037080cb1f8ff8af1517bcff16733d988726423ee4b62d58.zip

Bad design when adding a new device.

image640×1136 319 KB

(Especially the text at the bottom)

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.39 release.
